import numpy as np
import random
import os 

SEED = 2022
def seed_everything(seed=SEED):
    random.seed(seed)
    os.environ['PYTHONHASHSEED'] = str(seed)
    np.random.seed(seed)
    
seed_everything()

def smape(actual, forecast):
    return 1/len(actual) * np.sum(2 * np.abs(forecast-actual) / (np.abs(actual) + np.abs(forecast))*100)
